docs.snippet: U.S. policy toward China has been misdirected for decades and policymakers are now recalibrating ties, Senator Elizabeth Warren told reporters during a visit to Beijing amid heightened trade tensions between the world's two largest economies.

headline.print_headline: Senator Warren, in Beijing, Says U.S. Is Waking Up to Chinese Abuses
headline.main: Senator Warren, in Beijing, Says U.S. Is Waking Up to Chinese Abuses

docs.snippet: A federal grand jury in Maryland has indicted six alleged members of a violent street gang that's been a prime Trump administration target.

headline.print_headline: Federal Jury Indicts 6 Alleged MS-13 Members in Maryland
headline.main: Federal Jury Indicts 6 Alleged MS-13 Members in Maryland

docs.snippet: U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on Chinese goods may not be imposed until early June, administration officials said on Wednesday, with public consultations and potential tariff revisions buying time for negotiations to forestall them.

headline.print_headline: Trump's China Tariffs May Not Begin Until June-U.S. Officials
headline.main: Trump's China Tariffs May Not Begin Until June-U.S. Officials

docs.snippet: Attorney General Jeff Sessions said Thursday he won't immediately appoint a new special counsel to investigate a number of Republican grievances involving the FBI and Justice Department, despite mounting pressure from members of his own party.

headline.print_headline: Sessions: No New Special Counsel Yet for Republican Concerns
headline.main: Sessions: No New Special Counsel Yet for Republican Concerns

docs.snippet: Carvey’s impression on “The Late Show” was reminiscent of his take on the first President George Bush — but quite a bit more ludicrous.

headline.print_headline: Dana Carvey Plays John Bolton With a ‘Hair Trigger,’ Emphasis on Hair
headline.main: Dana Carvey Plays John Bolton With a ‘Hair Trigger,’ Emphasis on Hair

docs.snippet: Attorneys for former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort are arguing that the special counsel leading the Russia investigation is hiding what led agents to search a storage unit in connection with Manafort's ongoing criminal case.

headline.print_headline: Manafort Attorney: Special Counsel Hiding Reason for Search
headline.main: Manafort Attorney: Special Counsel Hiding Reason for Search

docs.snippet: France, Britain and Germany are struggling to persuade their EU partners to back new sanctions on Iran to preserve its nuclear deal, diplomats said, with Italy doubting whether the measures can stop the United States pulling out in May.

headline.print_headline: European Powers Face Resistance to Iran Sanctions to Save Nuclear Deal
headline.main: European Powers Face Resistance to Iran Sanctions to Save Nuclear Deal

docs.snippet: The meeting, Mr. Kim’s first with another head of state, added a new layer of complexity to the global diplomacy around North Korea’s nuclear program.

headline.print_headline: North Korea’s Kim Met Xi During Secret Visit to Beijing
headline.main: Kim Jong-un Met With Xi Jinping In Secret Beijing Visit

docs.snippet: Five big U.S. airlines might add flights to Havana after some carriers dropped service to Cuba's capital.

headline.print_headline: US Redistributes Havana Routes to 5 Big US Airlines
headline.main: US Redistributes Havana Routes to 5 Big US Airlines

docs.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on Thursday, March 29, 2018.
